description.value:
You funnel the energy granted by your pact through these gloves, amplifying your power.

Hands Slot: Uncommon

Property:

When you deal extra damage as a result of your Warlock's Curse, you can choose that damage to be acid, cold, or fire (or leave it untyped).

Power - Encounter (Free Action)

The next attack you make this turn deals extra damage depending on how many charges you spend: 1 charge, 1d6 damage; 2 charges, 2d6 damage; 5 charges, 3d6 damage. This extra damage can be acid, cold, or fire damage.

Level 18: 1 charge, 1d8 damage; 2 charges, 2d8 damage; 5 charges, 3d8 damage.

Level 28: 1 charge, 1d10 damage; 2 charges, 2d10 damage; 5 charges, 3d10 damage.
